titles.title: Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012
Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an additional advance refunding for certain tax-exempt bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a second advance refunding of an original tax-exempt private activity bond.
